summary: 今日焦点集中于多领域AI应用深化：医学影像（脑肿瘤分割与生存预测）、教育研究自动化（EduResearchBench）、跨语言可解释性（Indic-TunedLens）及宗教文本理解（CGRA-DeBERTa），同时凸显模型安全防护（防蒸馏）与持续学习（Panini）等基础能力演进，体现AI从技术攻坚向场景落地与伦理治理的系统性拓展。

news.title: Attention-gated U-Net model for semantic segmentation of brain tumors and feature extraction for survival prognosis
news.comment: Attention-Gated R2U-Net结合三平面架构，Dice达0.900，实用性强且具临床价值。

news.title: ResearchGym: Evaluating Language Model Agents on Real-World AI Research
news.comment: 首个面向真实科研流程的AI代理评测基准，推动AI研究自动化评估发展

news.title: Protecting Language Models Against Unauthorized Distillation through Trace Rewriting
news.comment: 提出通过动态重写推理痕迹实现反蒸馏与API水印，兼具实用性和创新性

news.title: Panini: Continual Learning in Token Space via Structured Memory
news.comment: 提出结构化记忆的持续学习框架，解决RAG效率与相关性问题，具实用价值

news.title: da Costa and Tarski meet Goguen and Carnap: a novel approach for ontological heterogeneity based on consequence systems
news.comment: 形式化逻辑与本体异构性研究的前沿论文，融合Carnap-Goguen主义与Tarski后果算子，具理论深度与工程潜力。

news.title: Mind the (DH) Gap! A Contrast in Risky Choices Between Reasoning and Conversational LLMs
news.comment: 首篇系统性对比推理与对话模型风险决策差异的高质量论文，揭示LLM行为分层现象

news.title: EduResearchBench: A Hierarchical Atomic Task Decomposition Benchmark for Full-Lifecycle Educational Research
news.comment: 首个面向教育科研全流程的原子任务分解评估基准，填补LLM在学术写作评估领域的空白。

news.title: Indic-TunedLens: Interpreting Multilingual Models in Indian Languages
news.comment: 针对印度语种的可解释性框架，填补多语言模型本地化分析空白，具实用价值。

news.title: CGRA-DeBERTa Concept Guided Residual Augmentation Transformer for Theologically Islamic Understanding
news.comment: 领域专用Transformer架构创新，结合伊斯兰神学先验知识提升QA性能

news.title: AIC CTU@AVerImaTeC: dual-retriever RAG for image-text fact checking
news.comment: 双检索RAG架构简洁高效，结合文本与图像检索提升事实核查精度，具实用价值与可复现性。
